Installation#


Cloning the Data Challenge#

Clone the data challenge repo:

git clone git@github.com:ocean-data-challenges/2024_DC_WOC-ESA.git

Install the velocity metrics package#

Pip install the package from GitLab directly, in order to have the latest version:

pip install git+https://git.oceandatalab.com/woc/velocity_metrics.git

You’re now good to go !#
